General_Description: '''Burning Booty''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Resources that are key to the [[Sparta]]n [[Peloponnesian War|war effort]] are being stored in crates." – [[Nation Leader|Leader]] of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and destroyed Spartan resource crates throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
